DOC.brief_summary: This three arm randomize trial . The aim evaluate antimicrobial activity chlorhexidine polyhexamethylene biguanide oral antiseptic microorganisms oral cavity . A total 30 healthy volunteer enrol randomly allocate control group ( CG , n=10 ) , instruct rinse mouth 10ml sterile saline solution one minute , chlorhexidine group ( ClG , n=10 ) , instruct rinse mouth 10ml 0.12 % chlorhexidine solution , one minute , polyhexamethylene biguanide group ( PG , n=10 ) , instruct rinse mouth 10ml 0.07 % polyhexamethylene biguanide solution , one minute . Samples saliva collect mouth wash 30 , 60 180 minute . Samples plat manitol agar , mitis salivarius agar , EMB agar Sabouraud agar . Samples process blinded microbiologist .
DOC.criteria: patient age 1830 year patient hypersensitivity allergic response component formula antiseptic , pregnant woman , lactate , history periodontal disease , smoking , decompensated diabetic , patient undergo chemotherapy , radiotherapy patient , transplant patient refuse participate , sign term free inform concentiment
